entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
